alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 14 at 9:56AM MST until December 14 at 9:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 1 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Southern Rocky Mountain Front and adjacent foothills and plains, and Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds behind the cold front may result in a few hours of blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Southern High Plains; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
